hero.title: Welcome to DreamIT
hero.subtitle: Building software for the future
hero.solarText:
A long time ago in a digital galaxy far, far away...

The DreamIT agency harnesses the power of the SOLAR SYSTEM
to illuminate the web with cutting-edge technologies...

Fueled by RUST for performance, NEXT.JS for reactivity,
and THREE.JS for immersive 3D experiences...

DreamIT brings your visions to life in the vast expanse of code...
